description.value: You've trained your mount to become a powerful force on the battlefield. The mount you gained through the Cavalier Dedication feat becomes a mature animal companion, granting it additional capabilities. During an encounter, even if you don't use the Command an Animal action, your animal companion can still use 1 action on your turn to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Stride]{Stride} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Strike]{Strike}.
